title: Instant 14 days suspension
body:

I know that was wrong, but I think it is unfair to instantly 14 day ban me instead of giving, like you are doing it to other players, a chat restriction or is it just a failure from your support?
I don't know.
I hope for a constructive answer, thanks!

replies.body: But a chat restriction does the same work

But a chat restriction wouldn't hold the same weight as an actual punishment. As Chermorg said, certain things cross the line between a little toxic and definitely never okay. If you want more context on punishments, reach out to our player behavior team in a ticket.

Things such as encouraging someone to kill themselves that are censored on the boards with %%% signs are things that are “zero tolerance” - they are things Riot considers that no normal person should even need a warning to not use.

It is considered **extreme** toxicity to encourage someone to kill themselves over a video game. You’re lucky Riot gave you a 14 day ban as a “final” warning before just permanently suspending you, because as I said, you shouldn’t need a warning that kind of behavior is inappropriate.
